definition[0]: someone who is eligible for something is able or allowed to do it, for example because they are the right age
example[0]: Students on a part-time course are not eligible for a loan.
example[1]: Over 500,000 18-year-olds will become eligible to vote this year.
definition[1]: an eligible man or woman would be good to marry because they are rich, attractive, and not married
example[2]: Stephen was regarded as an eligible bachelor.
definition[2]: allowed to do something or receive something
example[3]: Are you eligible for social security benefits?
